name: Escape from the ferris wheel
description:
This is a short point and click adventure game made in a few hours for ludum dare 47 with the theme stuck in a loop. My first submission and had a very small amount of time to do it in! 

You’re stuck on a Ferris Wheel that won’t stop, and only by climbing to the other carriages and talking to the other passengers can you hope to save yourself, and everyone else.

The underlying message is that we’re all stuck on the same wheel of life, connected and sharing a mutual fate. Even if we usually only seem to see our own problems, there is a greater threat that can only be solved by acting on behalf of the whole. A very crude analogy to real life, especially with the climate situation and destruction of nature we’re facing.

Made in adventure game studio. learning to use it for the first time during the jam!

Implemented interactions are Look at, Push and Talk to
